title: Starting with output
description: Move the output block from the blocks tray to the block editor and run the program.
hint: You can move the block with either the mouse or by using the keyboard. For the keyboard, use tab to go into the bag by going past the stop button onto a button and pressing enter. This brings you into the editor and pressing enter a second time brings you into the bag with the element calling Changing Text in focus. From there, press tab to get to the block and then enter a third time to put the block into the editor as a placeholder. Pressing enter one more time puts the block in. You can press CTRL + SHIFT + R to run the program or select the Run button.
